summary: A group of friends stranded near a desolate cornfield find shelter in an old farmhouse, though they soon discover the dwelling is the center of a supernatural ritual.
cast: Devon Graye|Wes Chatham|C.J. Thomason|Tammin Sursok|Ben Easter|Josh Skipworth|Nick Toussaint|Michael Cornelison|Aaron Harpold|Candice Rose
keywords: attacked with a pitchfork|american horror|cigarette lighter|death|death by pitchfork
title: Husk
